lines.text: How can you be so disrespectful of your father's memory?
I'm not being disrespectful, Mother. I'm being honest. From now on, I'm gonna be honest with my father's memory.
Do you want to drink with me?
Oh, I don't drink with the living. But tonight I come to visit the dead, to celebrate with them. Do you visit your dead ones, amigo?
No, but sometimes they come to visit me.
It isn't easy at my age to bring together the opportunity, the desire and the energy.
When gentlemen start talking about principles, we poor people lose what we don't even have!
